results.title: Hollow man
results.creator_credit: Columbia Pictures, Douglas Wick, Alan Marshall and Paul Verhoeven
results.brief_description: Scientist Sebastian Caine (Kevin Bacon) and his team have spent years trying to discover the formula to make matter invisible. When initial testing on a gorilla proves the developed serum works, Caine is pressured into testing it on a human candidate by his supervisor Dr. Kramer (William Devane), despite the formula being unstable. Rather than screen likely candidates, Caine decides to test the serum on himself. However, while the formula injected into the gorilla could be reversed, once Caine proves that his formula also works on humans his team are unable to reverse the process. Despite the team’s efforts to find a solution, Caine, unable to deal with his invisibility goes insane and begins to stalk his research team, in particular his ex-girlfriend Linda (Elisabeth Shue) and Matt (Josh Brolin), her new boyfriend. Director Paul Verhoeven uses computer-aided special effects in an amazingly realistic portrayal of invisibility in this sci-fi thriller which also stars Kim Dickens, Mary Jo Randle and Joey Slotnick.

group_siblings.title: Early and finished versions of locations in Hallownest

results.title: Hollow Knight
results.brief_description: Hollow Knight is an award-winning platforming game developed by Australian indie studio Team Cherry.

constellations_primary.name: Silent adventures (Hollow Knight - Education)
constellations_primary.description: Videogames, film and TV usually rely on the spoken word to communicate character and story. It wasn’t always this way. Although we may think of ‘silent films’ as in the past, there are contemporary videogames and films that shy away from using the spoken word.

results.description:
Hollow Knight is an award-winning platforming game developed by Australian indie studio Team Cherry.

Players explore vast underground catacombs of the ruined Hallownest kingdom. Much of the map is locked off to the player in the beginning but becomes accessible after the player finds key objects or gains new or enhanced skills.

Initially created through a successful Kickstarter campaign, Hollow Knight has playful animation, slick game mechanics and a unique gothic aesthetic that has seen it sell over a million copies worldwide.
description_for_label:

results.title: Holland: a traditional menu
results.creator_credit: Screenscope, Marilyn Weiner and Hal Weiner
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World of Cooking”.
Generations ago, a harsh climate and back-breaking farmwork inspired Dutch cooks to develop hearty, nutritious dishes. Much of the hardship has subsided, but the traditional foods are still a favourite with the Dutch. Chef Hans Clemens prepares one mouth-watering meal.

results.title: Holistic Health the New Medicine
results.brief_description: Mind/body relationships is the theme of many of the holistic doctors. Others stress a better relationship between traditional and Western methods. All stress treating the whole person - body, mind, and spirit. This film shows doctors, leaders in the field, at work and demonstrates their methods for controlling pain, healing cancer, and promoting optimum health.

results.title: Holidays on the River Yarra
results.creator_credit: Jungle Pictures, Film Victoria, Fiona Cochrane and Leo Berkeley
results.brief_description: Mick and Eddie, (Craig Adams and Luke Elliot), grow up tough in the big city. Typical teenagers, on the lookout for adventure, they struggle to succeed in a world of violence and industrial decay. To build their dream, it will take everything they’ve got in their fight against the system.

results.title: Holidays and waterways
results.creator_credit: Australian National Film Board, Australian Canoe Clubs and Eric Thompson
results.brief_description: Canoeing is one of Australia’s popular holiday sports. Along the Mitta Mitta river and the upper reaches of the Yarra, campers spend their holidays fishing, swimming, hiking and canoeing. The most common type of canoe used is the light, manoeuvrable Canadian type. Streams after heavy rains provide adventure and a test of good judgment; some explore mountain streams; compete in canoe trials or train for Olympic events. On the coast, canoe surfing is popular, but, nonetheless hazardous.

results.title: Holiday: a short tale
results.brief_description: Contemplative short film of one man’s journey of the mind to escape the reality of his daily existence. This is a visually evocative piece, backed by an expressive music soundtrack and the sounds of nature.
